info.title: Golang Screenshot Microservice API.
info.termsOfService: there are no TOS at this moment, use at your own risk we take no responsibility

JSONData builds the custom payload needed for the go-screenshot-worker

description.example: This is the description of the Requesting Source type

UpdateRequestingSource.description:
UpdateRequestingSource defines what information may be provided to
modify an existing UpdateNewRequestingSource. All fields are optional
so clients can send just the fields they want changed. It uses pointer
fields so we can differentiate between a field that was not provided
and a field that was provided as explicitly blank. Normally we do not
want to use pointers to basic types but we make exceptions around
marshalling/unmarshalling.
